name: Alien Age (itch) (Indie Wizards, ludosis, Ricotta02, Christopher Reeves, Nathan.hales, David R. Bowditch, Daniel Astacio, DarcZaFire, RowanRedGryphon, David Doane, AllergictoCrustaceans, Msandfrey, Dan Mellott)
name_original: Alien Age (itch) (Indie Wizards, ludosis, Ricotta02, Christopher Reeves, Nathan.hales, David R. Bowditch, Daniel Astacio, DarcZaFire, RowanRedGryphon, David Doane, AllergictoCrustaceans, Msandfrey, Dan Mellott)
description:
Join our newsletter: https://mailchi.mp/e7c3e7e59e8b/sign-up

Instructions

Merge raw resources and deliver the merged items to the correct town to upgrade them through the Stone Age, Bronze Age, Mechanical, and Space Age before for all the towns degrade.  Be warned that merging recipes become increasingly complex the further along your towns have progressed! 

Controls

Movement:  LMB
Boost Movement: LMB x2
Interact: RMB
Recipes: Tab
Pause: Esc
Lock/Unlock Camera: Spacebar
Pan Camera: WASD
Zoom In/Out: Mouse Wheel
